errors.error_description: The usage example `twine upload build/*` points to the wrong directory. Standard Python build tools place distribution packages in the `dist/` directory, not `build/`, so Twine will not find any files to upload.
The example `.pypirc` configuration is missing the required `[pypi]` section header. Without the header, Twine cannot parse the file correctly.
correction_candidates: Add `[pypi]` on a new line before the `username` field.
Use environment variables `TWINE_USERNAME` and `TWINE_PASSWORD` instead of a file.
errors.golden_answer: Add `[pypi]` on a new line before the `username` field.
